testCase.requirementText: Structural description identifier mets/structMap[@LABEL='CSIP']/@ID An xml:id identifier for the structural description (structMap) used for internal package references. It must be unique within the package.
testCase.description: The requirement links to http://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#the-use-of-identifiers and simple xml-validation will catch if IDs are not unique. Therefore it is considered out of scope within this test corpus.
